thread.title: You home in the heart of London
thread.title_full: You home in the heart of London - Review of Fraser Suites Queens Gate, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Christos A
title: You home in the heart of London
text: This is my second time in a Fraser place in london. Queens gate Fraser suites is the ideal place in the center of london to stay. Very big , clean, modern and comfortable rooms equipped with everything that may be needed to ensure a comfortable stay. The service is ideal. Fraser group is once more proved to be ithe worlds top serviced apartments brand.
